person.persName: Daniel S. Berry (Union County, KY, cabinet maker and carpenter)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, cabinet maker and carpenter. Kentucky native. Married to Sally McKay Berry in Nelson County on August 11, 1836. Father of Francis M. Berry, Harrisson Berry, Sophronia Berry, Daneil E. Berry, and John S. Berry. Cabinet maker in Union County in 1850. Carpenter in Union County in 1860.
